165_P_BC_CP_2.name: Equipment Status
165_P_BC_CP_2.desc: Reflects the current state of circuits, features, bodies, and equipment attached to the OCP.

payload.name: Feature States 1-8
payload.desc: Bit flags for features 1-8 (IDs 129-136). v3.004+: All 8 bits are reliable. v1.x: Upper nibble unreliable after v1.047.

payload.name: Feature States 9-16
payload.desc: Bit flags for features 9-16 (IDs 137-144). v3.004+: Bits 0-1 confirmed for features 9-10. v1.x: Unreliable after v1.047.

payload.name: Panel Mode
payload.desc: Panel mode and settings bit flags
payload.values: Bit 0=Service mode, Bit 2=Temp units (0=F, 1=C), Bit 3=Freeze protection, Bit 7=Timeout (*Touch only)

payload.name: Water Sensor 1
payload.desc: Water temperature sensor 1 (Body 1/Pool or shared body)

payload.name: Water Sensor 2
payload.desc: Water temperature sensor 2 (Body 2/Spa, only on dual/multi-body systems)

payload.name: Water Sensor 3
payload.desc: Water temperature sensor 3 (Body 3, multi-body IntelliCenter only)

payload.name: Water Sensor 4
payload.desc: Water temperature sensor 4 (Body 4, multi-body IntelliCenter only)

payload.name: Heat Mode Body 3&4 / DST
payload.values: *Touch: Lower 4 bits=Body 3, Upper 4 bits=Body 4. IntelliCenter: Bit 0=Auto DST (inverted)

payload.name: Model Byte 1
payload.desc: Controller model identifier byte 1. Used for controller detection.

payload.name: Model Byte 2
payload.desc: Controller model identifier byte 2 - determines controller type

165_P_BC_CP_96.name: IntelliBrite Light Mode Status
165_P_BC_CP_96.desc: Status broadcast for IntelliBrite light systems containing theme and mode information. Used for light synchronization and theme changes.

165_P_BC_CP_164.name: Configuration Version Response
165_P_BC_CP_164.desc: Response from the IntelliCenter panel containing the current configuration version numbers for all configuration categories.

payload.name: Circuit Groups Version
payload.desc: Version number for circuit/light groups configuration

payload.name: General Version
payload.desc: Version number for general settings configuration

payload.name: System State Version
payload.desc: Version number for system state configuration

165_P_BC_CP_179.name: Remote Status Request
165_P_BC_CP_179.desc: Heartbeat request from OCP to a specific device (njsPC, wireless remote, etc.). Device must respond with Action 180. Added in IntelliCenter firmware v3.004+.

payload.name: Sequence
payload.desc: Sequence/counter byte for the heartbeat request

165_P_BC_CP_180.name: Remote Status Response
165_P_BC_CP_180.desc: Heartbeat response from device back to OCP. Sent in reply to Action 179 request. Payload is typically 10-16 bytes of zeros. Added in IntelliCenter firmware v3.004+.

payload.name: Status Bytes
payload.desc: Device status bytes. Typically all zeros for simple devices like njsPC. May contain device-specific status information for other devices.

165_P_BC_CP_204.name: Extended Status
165_P_BC_CP_204.desc: Reflects the current state of IntelliCenter features, bodies, and equipment attached to the OCP. Contains expansion module info, firmware version, date/time, and equipment states. IntelliCenter ONLY - not used by *Touch controllers.

payload.name: Unknown 0
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 1
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Battery Voltage
payload.desc: Battery voltage in volts. Divide byte value by 50 to get voltage.

payload.name: Unknown 3
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Keep Alives
payload.desc: Count of communication keepalive messages. 16-bit little-endian integer (byte 4 = low, byte 5 = high).

payload.name: Feature States (v1.x only)
payload.desc: Bit flags for feature states starting at feature ID 129. Each bit represents one feature (up to 32 features). NOT PROCESSED in v3.004+ - authoritative source is Action 30 case 15. Actual length is variable based on configured features.
payload.notes: v3.004+ ignores this field due to stale data issue

payload.name: Master Module Byte 1
payload.desc: Master expansion module identifier byte 1. For v1.x: low nibble is module type. For v3.004+: high nibble is module type.

payload.name: Master Module Byte 2
payload.desc: Master expansion module identifier byte 2. Used for determining installed equipment capabilities.

payload.name: EXP1 Module Byte 1
payload.condition: Only valid if byte 40 bit 0 is set

payload.name: EXP1 Module Byte 2
payload.condition: Only valid if byte 40 bit 0 is set

payload.name: EXP2 Module Byte 1
payload.condition: Only valid if byte 40 bit 1 is set

payload.name: EXP2 Module Byte 2
payload.condition: Only valid if byte 40 bit 1 is set

payload.name: EXP3 Module Byte 1
payload.condition: Only valid if byte 40 bit 2 is set

payload.name: EXP3 Module Byte 2
payload.condition: Only valid if byte 40 bit 2 is set

payload.name: Unknown 21
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 22
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 23
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 24
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 25
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Body State (i10D)
payload.desc: For IntelliCenter i10D: Body state flags. Currently commented out in code.

payload.name: Model Byte 1
payload.desc: Controller model identifier byte 1. Used during controller detection. Values: 0=v1.232, 3=v3.004, 23/40+=v1.0xx

payload.name: Model Byte 2
payload.desc: Controller model identifier byte 2. Used during controller detection. Values: 0=v1.0xx, 2=v1.232/v3.004

payload.name: Unknown 29
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 31
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 32
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 33
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 34
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 35
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 36
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Unknown 39
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Expansion Present
payload.desc: Bit flags indicating which expansion modules are installed
payload.values: Bit 0=EXP1 present, Bit 1=EXP2 present, Bit 2=EXP3 present

payload.name: Unknown 41
payload.desc: Unknown purpose. Not processed in Action 204 handler.

payload.name: Firmware Version (Minor)
payload.desc: Controller firmware version minor number. Divide by 1000 and add to major for full version.

payload.name: Time Hour (v3.004+)
payload.desc: Current hour in 24-hour format. Only present in v3.004+ (48-byte payload).

payload.name: Time Minute (v3.004+)
payload.desc: Current minute. Only present in v3.004+ (48-byte payload).

payload.name: Time Second (v3.004+)
payload.desc: Current second. Only present in v3.004+ (48-byte payload).

payload.name: Status Flags (v3.004+)
payload.desc: Status flags. Possibly DST indicator or other status information. Only present in v3.004+ (48-byte payload).

165_P_BC_CP_217.name: Device List Broadcast
165_P_BC_CP_217.desc: OCP broadcasts registered devices after Action 251→253 handshake. Added in IntelliCenter firmware v3.004+. Each packet contains info for ONE device.

payload.name: Device Address
payload.desc: Address of the registered device (e.g., 33=njsPC, 36=wireless remote)

payload.name: Registration Status
payload.desc: Current registration status of the device with the OCP

165_P_BC_CP_251.name: Device Announcement
165_P_BC_CP_251.desc: Devices send this to announce presence to OCP and request registration. Added in IntelliCenter firmware v3.004+.

payload.name: Device Address
payload.desc: The address of the device announcing itself

payload.name: Device Type
payload.desc: Type code identifying the device category

165_P_BC_CP_253.name: Device Registration Confirmation
165_P_BC_CP_253.desc: OCP sends this in response to Action 251 to confirm device registration. Added in IntelliCenter firmware v3.004+.

payload.name: Registration Status
payload.desc: Whether the device was successfully registered

165_P_BC_CP_5.name: Date and Time broadcast
165_P_BC_CP_5.desc: Reflects the current date and time for IntelliTouch controllers. Action 2 contains time for all controllers.

165_P_BC_CP_133.name: Sets the date and time on the OCP
165_P_BC_CP_133.desc: Sets the date and time for all *Touch controllers. Payload mirrors Action 5 structure.

165_P_CP_CP_197.name: Gets the date and time on the OCP
165_P_CP_CP_197.desc: Gets the date and time for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 5.

165_P_BC_CP_8.name: Heat/Temperature state
165_P_BC_CP_8.desc: Reflects the current heating state and temperature setpoints for IntelliTouch controllers.

payload.name: Water Sensor 2
payload.desc: Water temperature sensor 2 (Spa/Body 2, dual systems only)

payload.name: Heat Mode Body 1&2
payload.desc: Lower 4 bits=Body 1, Upper 4 bits=Body 2 (bits 0,4,5 for hybrid support)

payload.name: Body 1 Cool Setpoint
payload.desc: Cooling setpoint for Body 1 (for UltraTemp ETi heatpumps)

payload.name: Body 2 Cool Setpoint
payload.desc: Cooling setpoint for Body 2 (for UltraTemp ETi heatpumps)

payload.name: Heat Mode Body 3&4
payload.desc: Lower 4 bits=Body 3 heat mode, Upper 4 bits=Body 4 heat mode. 0=Off, 2=Solar Preferred

165_P_CP_CP_136.name: Set the Heat/Temperature settings
165_P_CP_CP_136.desc: Sets the current heating state for all *Touch controllers. Used when external controller sets heat mode.

payload.name: Heat Mode Body 1&2
payload.desc: Lower 4 bits=Body 1 heat mode, Upper 4 bits=Body 2 heat mode

165_P_CP_CP_200.name: Get the Heat/Temperature settings
165_P_CP_CP_200.desc: Gets the current heating state for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 8.

165_P_BC_CP_10.name: A Custom Name
165_P_BC_CP_10.desc: Reflects a custom name for all *Touch controllers.

payload.name: Custom Name ID
payload.desc: ID of the custom name entry (1-based)

payload.name: Custom Name
payload.desc: The custom name string (up to 11 characters)

165_P_CP_CP_138.name: Sets a custom name
165_P_CP_CP_138.desc: Sets a custom name for all *Touch controllers. Same payload structure as Action 10.

payload.name: Custom Name ID
payload.desc: ID of the custom name entry to set (1-based)

payload.name: Custom Name
payload.desc: The custom name string (up to 11 characters)

165_P_CP_CP_202.name: Gets a Custom Name
165_P_CP_CP_202.desc: Gets a custom name for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 10.

payload.name: Custom Name ID
payload.desc: ID of the custom name to retrieve

165_P_BC_CP_11.name: A circuit/feature configuration
165_P_BC_CP_11.desc: Reflects a configuration for a circuit/feature for all *Touch controllers.

payload.name: Function ID
payload.desc: Circuit type (bits 0-5) + freeze protection (bit 6). See circuitFunctions valuemap.

payload.name: Name ID
payload.desc: Index into the custom names table (0 for default, or custom name ID)

165_P_CP_CP_139.name: Sets a circuit/feature configuration
165_P_CP_CP_139.desc: Sets a configuration for a circuit/feature for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 11.

payload.name: Name ID
payload.desc: Index into the custom names table

165_P_CP_CP_203.name: Gets a circuit/feature configuration
165_P_CP_CP_203.desc: Gets a configuration for a circuit/feature for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 11.

payload.name: Circuit ID
payload.desc: ID of the circuit to retrieve

165_P_BC_CP_16.name: Heat pump configuration
165_P_BC_CP_16.desc: Reflects the heat pump configuration for all *Touch controllers.

payload.name: Cooling Enabled
payload.desc: Whether cooling mode is enabled (for ETi)

165_P_CP_CP_144.name: Sets a heat pump configuration
165_P_CP_CP_144.desc: Sets a configuration for a heat pump for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 16.

165_P_CP_CP_208.name: Gets a heat pump configuration
165_P_CP_CP_208.desc: Gets a configuration for a heat pump for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 16.

165_P_BC_CP_17.name: A defined schedule
165_P_BC_CP_17.desc: Reflects a schedule for all *Touch controllers.

payload.name: Start Hour
payload.desc: Start time hours (0-23). Value 25 indicates egg timer mode.

payload.name: End Hour
payload.desc: End time hours (0-23). Value 26 indicates run-once mode with egg timer.

payload.name: Schedule Days
payload.desc: Bit flags for days of week (bits 0-6 = Sun-Sat)

165_P_CP_CP_145.name: Sets a schedule configuration
165_P_CP_CP_145.desc: Sets a configuration for a schedule for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 17.

payload.name: Schedule Days
payload.desc: Bit flags for days of week (bits 0-6 = Sun-Sat)

165_P_CP_CP_209.name: Gets a schedule configuration
165_P_CP_CP_209.desc: Gets a configuration for a schedule for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 17.

payload.name: Schedule ID
payload.desc: ID of the schedule to retrieve

165_P_CP_CP_19.name: IntelliChem configuration
165_P_CP_CP_19.desc: Reflects an IntelliChem config for all *Touch controllers.

165_P_BC_CP_147.name: Sets the IntelliChem configuration
165_P_BC_CP_147.desc: Sets the IntelliChem configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 19.

165_P_CP_CP_211.name: Gets the IntelliChem configuration
165_P_CP_CP_211.desc: Gets the IntelliChem configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 19.

165_P_BC_CP_24.name: A configuration for a pump
165_P_BC_CP_24.desc: Reflects a pump config for all *Touch controllers. Contains pump type and speed/flow settings.

payload.name: Background Circuit
payload.desc: Background circuit for VF pumps (pump type is actually this value for VF)

payload.name: Speed/Flow Programs
payload.desc: Up to 8 speed/flow program values (2 bytes each for VSF, 1 byte indexes for VS)

165_P_CP_CP_152.name: Sets a pump configuration
165_P_CP_CP_152.desc: Sets a pump configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 24.

165_P_CP_CP_216.name: Gets a pump configuration
165_P_CP_CP_216.desc: Gets a pump configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 24.

165_P_BC_CP_23.name: A configuration for a pump status
165_P_BC_CP_23.desc: Reflects a pump status config for all *Touch controllers. Similar to Action 24 but focuses on pump runtime/status.

payload.name: RPM/GPM
payload.desc: Current speed in RPM or flow in GPM (2 bytes, big-endian)

165_P_CP_CP_215.name: Gets a pump status
165_P_CP_CP_215.desc: Gets a pump status for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 23.

payload.name: Pump ID
payload.desc: Pump identifier to retrieve status for

165_P_BC_CP_22.name: A configuration for a spa side controller
165_P_BC_CP_22.desc: Reflects a spa side controller config for all *Touch controllers.

payload.name: Address
payload.desc: RS-485 address of the spa side controller

payload.name: Button Assignments
payload.desc: Circuit assignments for the 4 buttons on the spa side remote

165_P_CP_CP_150.name: Sets a spa side controller configuration
165_P_CP_CP_150.desc: Sets a spa side controller configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 22.

165_P_CP_CP_214.name: Gets a spa side controller configuration
165_P_CP_CP_214.desc: Gets a spa side controller configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 22.

165_P_BC_CP_25.name: A configuration for a chlorinator
165_P_BC_CP_25.desc: Reflects a chlorinator config for all *Touch controllers.

payload.name: Active + Spa Setpoint
payload.desc: Bit 0 = chlorinator active flag, Bits 1-7 = spa setpoint percentage

payload.name: Super Chlor Hours
payload.desc: Super chlorinate hours remaining. Value - 128 if > 128.

165_P_CP_CP_153.name: Sets a chlorinator configuration
165_P_CP_CP_153.desc: Sets a chlorinator configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 25.

payload.name: Active + Spa Setpoint
payload.desc: Bit 0 = active flag, Bits 1-7 = spa setpoint percentage

165_P_CP_CP_217.name: Gets a chlorinator configuration
165_P_CP_CP_217.desc: Gets a chlorinator configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 25.

165_P_BC_CP_29.name: Valve configuration
165_P_BC_CP_29.desc: Reflects the valve config for all *Touch controllers. Contains valve-to-circuit assignments.

payload.name: Valve A Circuit
payload.desc: Circuit assigned to Valve A (255 = not assigned)

payload.name: Valve B Circuit
payload.desc: Circuit assigned to Valve B (255 = not assigned)

payload.name: Valve C Circuit
payload.desc: Circuit assigned to Valve C (255 = not assigned)

payload.name: Valve D Circuit
payload.desc: Circuit assigned to Valve D (255 = not assigned)

165_P_CP_CP_157.name: Sets the valve configuration
165_P_CP_CP_157.desc: Sets the valve configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 29.

payload.name: Valve A Circuit
payload.desc: Circuit assigned to Valve A (255 = not assigned)

payload.name: Valve B Circuit
payload.desc: Circuit assigned to Valve B (255 = not assigned)

payload.name: Valve C Circuit
payload.desc: Circuit assigned to Valve C (255 = not assigned)

payload.name: Valve D Circuit
payload.desc: Circuit assigned to Valve D (255 = not assigned)

165_P_CP_CP_221.name: Gets the valve configuration
165_P_CP_CP_221.desc: Gets the valve configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 29.

165_P_BC_CP_34.name: A configuration for a solar/heatpump
165_P_BC_CP_34.desc: Reflects the solar/heatpump config for all *Touch controllers.

payload.name: Start Temp Delta
payload.desc: Temperature difference to start solar heating

payload.name: Stop Temp Delta
payload.desc: Temperature difference to stop solar heating

165_P_CP_CP_162.name: Sets the solar/heatpump configuration
165_P_CP_CP_162.desc: Sets the solar/heatpump configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 34.

165_P_CP_CP_226.name: Gets the solar/heatpump configuration
165_P_CP_CP_226.desc: Gets the solar/heatpump configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 34.

165_P_BC_CP_35.name: A configuration for delays
165_P_BC_CP_35.desc: Reflects the delay config for all *Touch controllers. Contains pump and valve delay settings.

payload.name: Pump Delay
payload.desc: Pump off during valve operation flag (bit 7)

165_P_CP_CP_163.name: Sets the delay configuration
165_P_CP_CP_163.desc: Sets the delay configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 35.

payload.name: Pump Delay
payload.desc: Pump off during valve operation flag (bit 7)

165_P_CP_CP_131.name: Cancels all delays
165_P_CP_CP_131.desc: Cancels delays for all *Touch controllers. Sent to stop any pending delays.

payload.name: Cancel Type
payload.desc: Type of delay to cancel (typically 0 for all)

165_P_CP_CP_227.name: Gets the delay configuration
165_P_CP_CP_227.desc: Gets the delay configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 35.

165_P_CP_CP_228.name: Request Configuration Version
165_P_CP_CP_228.desc: Broadcast request to get the current configuration version from the IntelliCenter panel. Expects a response with action 164 containing version numbers for all configuration categories.

165_P_BC_CP_39.name: The configuration for IntelliBrite
165_P_BC_CP_39.desc: Reflects the IntelliBrite light group config for all *Touch controllers. Contains circuit assignments for synchronized lighting.

payload.name: Group Circuit 1
payload.desc: First circuit in the light group

payload.name: Group Circuit 2
payload.desc: Second circuit in the light group

payload.name: Additional Circuits
payload.desc: Remaining circuit/position pairs (up to 8 circuits total)

165_P_CP_CP_167.name: Sets the IntelliBrite configuration
165_P_CP_CP_167.desc: Sets the IntelliBrite configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 39.

payload.name: Group Circuit 1
payload.desc: First circuit in the light group

payload.name: Group Circuit 2
payload.desc: Second circuit in the light group

165_P_17_CP_110.name: Probes for EXP
165_P_17_CP_110.desc: Probes for expansion panels on IntelliTouch controllers.

165_P_18_CP_110.name: Probes for EXP
165_P_18_CP_110.desc: Probes for expansion panels on IntelliTouch controllers.

165_P_19_CP_110.name: Probes for EXP
165_P_19_CP_110.desc: Probes for expansion panels on IntelliTouch controllers.

165_P_CP_CP_231.name: Gets the IntelliBrite configuration
165_P_CP_CP_231.desc: Gets the IntelliBrite configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 39.

165_P_BC_CP_40.name: The settings configuration
165_P_BC_CP_40.desc: Reflects the settings config for all *Touch controllers. Contains general system options.

165_P_CP_CP_232.name: Gets a settings configuration
165_P_CP_CP_232.desc: Gets a settings configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 40.

165_P_BC_CP_32.name: A configuration for is4/is10 remotes
165_P_BC_CP_32.desc: Reflects a is4/is10 remote config for all *Touch controllers.

165_P_CP_CP_160.name: Sets a remote is4/is10 configuration
165_P_CP_CP_160.desc: Sets a remote is4/is10 configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 32.

165_P_CP_CP_224.name: Gets a remote is4/is10 configuration
165_P_CP_CP_224.desc: Gets a remote is4/is10 configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 32.

165_P_BC_CP_33.name: A configuration for remotes
165_P_BC_CP_33.desc: Reflects a remote config for all *Touch controllers.

payload.name: Button Assignments
payload.desc: Circuit assignments for up to 10 buttons

165_P_CP_CP_161.name: Sets a remote configuration
165_P_CP_CP_161.desc: Sets a remote configuration for all *Touch controllers. Same payload as Action 33.

payload.name: Button Assignments
payload.desc: Circuit assignments for up to 10 buttons

165_P_CP_CP_225.name: Gets a remote configuration
165_P_CP_CP_225.desc: Gets a remote configuration for all *Touch controllers. Response is Action 33.

165_P_BC_CP_184.name: Circuit Control (IntelliCenter v3.004+ Wireless)
165_P_BC_CP_184.desc: Native circuit control message used by the Wireless remote (addr 36) on IntelliCenter v3.004+. This is the preferred method for controlling circuits on v3.004+ as it doesn't suffer from state reversion issues like Action 168. The OCP responds with an ACK (Action 1 payload [184]). For body circuits (Spa/Pool), multiple 184 messages are sent in sequence with different target IDs.

payload.name: Channel ID High
payload.desc: Channel identifier high byte. Default channel is 104,143 (0x688F). Body context uses 128,142.

payload.name: Sequence
payload.desc: Sequence number. Commonly 0, but Pool body control uses 5.

payload.name: Format
payload.desc: Message format. 255 = command mode, 0 = body select mode.

payload.name: Target ID High
payload.desc: Target identifier high byte. Combined with low byte to form the circuit's unique targetId (hi*256 + lo).

payload.name: Context Data
payload.desc: Context-specific data. Usually 0,0,0 for circuit control. For body context (target 212,182): Spa ON=[101,4,0], Pool ON=[151,6,0], OFF=[255,255,255].

168_237.name: Body Toggle
168_237.desc: Body toggle primitive. Byte 6 is state (0=OFF, 1=ON). Used as final step in body control sequence.

212_182.name: Body Context
212_182.desc: Body context/status message. Bytes 6-9 contain body-specific context: Spa ON=[0,101,4,0], Pool ON=[128,151,6,0], OFF=[255,255,255,255].

114_145.name: Body Select
114_145.desc: Body selection/context. Byte 6 selects body: 0=Spa, 1=Pool. Uses channel 128,142 and format 0.

94_131.name: Body Mode
94_131.desc: Body/mode control. Byte 6: 128=OFF, 129=ON. Uses channel 128,142 and format 0.

108_225.name: Pool Circuit
108_225.desc: Pool circuit (circuit 6) direct control. Note: Wireless remote does NOT use this for body control - see Body Toggle instead.

circuit_specific.name: Circuit Control
circuit_specific.desc: Each circuit has a unique targetId learned from OCP broadcasts (poolConfig.json). Use the circuit's targetId with state 0/1 in byte 6.

circuit_on_off.name: Circuit ON/OFF
circuit_on_off.desc: Simple circuit control using learned targetId
steps: 1. Send Action 184 with circuit's targetId and state (0/1) in byte 6
3. OCP broadcasts Action 2 with updated circuit states

body_control_v3.name: Body Control (v3.004+)
body_control_v3.desc: Multi-step sequence for reliable Pool/Spa body control on v3.004+
steps: 1. Body Select (114,145): Choose Pool (byte6=1) or Spa (byte6=0)
2. Body Context (212,182): Send body-specific context bytes 6-9
4. Wait for each ACK before proceeding
body_control_v3.note: Required because sending Pool targetId directly often incorrectly activates Spa instead

notes: Wireless remote address is 36, OCP address is 16
TargetIds are learned from OCP broadcasts and stored in poolConfig.json
For v1.x systems without targetIds, use Action 168 instead

165_P_BC_CP_252.name: Request high speed circuits
165_P_BC_CP_252.desc: Requests the high speed circuit configuration.

165_P_CP_CP_253.name: Request software version
165_P_CP_CP_253.desc: Requests the software/firmware version from the controller.

165_P_BC_CP_41.name: Circuit group/macro config
165_P_BC_CP_41.desc: Reflects a circuit group or macro configuration.

165_P_CP_CP_233.name: Request circuit group/macro
165_P_CP_CP_233.desc: Requests a circuit group or macro configuration. Response is Action 41.

payload.name: Group ID
payload.desc: Circuit group or macro identifier to retrieve

165_P_CP_CP_134.name: Set circuit state
165_P_CP_CP_134.desc: Command to turn a circuit on or off. Response is ACK (Action 1).

payload.name: Circuit ID
payload.desc: ID of the circuit to control

165_P_CP_V_82.name: Ping OCP for an address
165_P_CP_V_82.desc: The valve will ping the OCP for an address when it is on the bus.

payload.name: Line
payload.desc: The line that is displayed on the controller

16_3_0.name: Set Chlorinator Control
16_3_0.desc: Sets the chlorinator control to the OCP.  This message is required to maintain the control of the chlorinator.

16_3_1.name: Control Acknowlegement
16_3_1.desc: Indicates that the chlorinator is now being controlled by the OCP.

16_3_3.name: Control Acknowlegement
16_3_3.desc: Indicates that the chlorinator is now being controlled by the OCP.

16_3_17.name: Set the output on the chlorinator
16_3_17.desc: Sets the chlorinator's output based upon the values in the payload

16_3_18.name: Status Response
16_3_18.desc: Response from the chloriator indicating the current status an salt level.

16_3_20.name: Get chlorinator model
16_3_20.desc: Request from the OCP to get the model of the chlorinator.

165_P_PMP_CP_1.name: Set pump drive speed and flow
165_P_PMP_CP_1.desc: Sets the rpm and/or flow of the pump.  This message is sent to take control of the pump and disable the local control panel on the drive.

165_P_CP_PMP_1.name: Set Pump Speed/Flow
165_P_CP_PMP_1.desc: Command to set pump speed (RPM) or flow (GPM). Response is ACK from pump.

payload.name: Speed/Flow Value
payload.desc: Target speed in RPM (2 bytes) or flow in GPM (high byte only). Bit 5 of byte 2 indicates RPM (0) or GPM (1)

165_P_PMP_CP_4.name: Set pump run state
165_P_PMP_CP_4.desc: Sets the run state pf the pump.  This message is sent to take control of the pump and disable the local control panel on the drive.

165_P_CP_PMP_4.name: Response to setting the run state.
165_P_CP_PMP_4.desc: This message is in response to the pump run state being set.  A return of 255 indicates that the local control panel on the drive has been disabled.

165_P_PMP_CP_5.name: Set pump drive feature
165_P_PMP_CP_5.desc: Sets the feature state of the pump.  This message is sent to set the .

165_P_CP_PMP_5.name: Response to setting the drive feature.
165_P_CP_PMP_5.desc: This message is in response to the pump drive feature being set.

165_P_PMP_CP_6.name: Set pump drive state
165_P_PMP_CP_6.desc: Sets the run state pf the pump.  This message is sent to take control of the pump and disable the local control panel on the drive.

165_P_CP_PMP_6.name: Response to setting the drive state.
165_P_CP_PMP_6.desc: This message is in response to the pump drive state being set.

165_P_PMP_CP_7.name: Get pump status
165_P_PMP_CP_7.desc: Broadcast request to get the current running status of the pump.

165_P_CP_PMP_7.name: Pump Status Response
165_P_CP_PMP_7.desc: Response from pump containing current operational status including speed, watts, flow, and error codes.

payload.name: RPM
payload.desc: Current pump speed in RPM (VS/VSF pumps only, 0 for VF)

payload.name: Flow (GPM)
payload.desc: Current flow rate in GPM (VSF pumps only, 0 for VS/VF)

payload.name: Status/Error
payload.values: Bit flags for pump errors and warnings

payload.name: Time (Minutes)
payload.desc: Runtime minutes counter (0-59, ticks every minute)

165_P_PMP_CP_10.name: Sets the speed or flow on the pump
165_P_PMP_CP_10.desc: Pump request to set the pump speed or flow.

165_P_CHM_CP_210.name: Get IntelliChem status
165_P_CHM_CP_210.dest: Request to get the status from IntelliChem

165_P_CHM_CP_146.name: Set IntelliChem options
165_P_CHM_CP_146.dest: Set options on the IntelliChem controller

165_P_CP_CHM_18.name: Chlorinator Status Response
165_P_CP_CHM_18.desc: Response from IntelliChlor containing current salt level and chlorinator status

payload.name: Salt Level
payload.values: Multiply by 50 to get PPM (e.g., 64 = 3200 PPM)
